block.torches_in_water.glow_ink_torch.de: Can be placed in water source or flow. Can be placed on the side of bottom slab or stairs. Will be destroyed by lava (can be configured).
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.torches_i: Added torches which can be placed in water.
yacl3.config.torches_in_water:cfg.lavaDe: Lava can destroy Glow Ink Torch.
